mapper.select: SELECT distinct hosp_name FROM hospital WHERE hosp_name LIKE '%' || #{search_keyword} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hospital H JOIN hos_dept D ON H.hosp_code = D.hosp_code WHERE H.address = #{address}

SELECT * FROM(SELECT (6371*ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{lng}))*COS(RADIANS(cor_x))*COS(RADIANS(cor_y)-RADIANS(#{lat}))+SIN(RADIANS(#{lng}))*SIN(RADIANS(cor_x)))) AS distanceByXY, h.*,hd.dept_name FROM hospital h JOIN hos_dept hd ON h.hosp_code = hd.hosp_code) disData WHERE disData.distanceByXY <= 0.5
SELECT * FROM pharmacy WHERE phar_name LIKE '%' || #{search_keyword} || '%'
SELECT distinct phar_name FROM pharmacy WHERE phar_name LIKE '%' || #{search_keyword} || '%'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT (6371*ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{lng}))*COS(RADIANS(cor_x))*COS(RADIANS(cor_y)-RADIANS(#{lat}))+SIN(RADIANS(#{lng}))*SIN(RADIANS(cor_x)))) AS distanceByXY, p.* FROM pharmacy p) disData WHERE disData.distanceByXY <= 0.5

SELECT count(*) FROM reservation WHERE hosp_code = (SELECT hosp_code FROM hospital WHERE address = #{address} AND AUTH = '제휴승인됨') AND approved = '승인됨' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = RES_DATE AND RES_TIME < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 60/24/60 ,'hh24:mi') AND RES_TIME > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'hh24:mi')

SELECT count(*) FROM reservation WHERE hosp_Code = (SELECT hosp_code FROM hospital WHERE address = #{address}) AND (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{datepick} AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(#{hourMinute},-2)) = TRUNC(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI'),-2)) / 10)*10 AND TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(#{hourMinute},1,2)) = TRUNC(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI'),1,2))) ) AND approved='승인됨'
SELECT m.mem_name,h.hosp_name, r.* FROM member m JOIN reservation r on m.mem_email = r.mem_email JOIN hospital h on r.hosp_code = h.hosp_code WHERE m.mem_email = #{mem_email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE RES_DATE = #{datepick} AND #{hourMinute} < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation VALUES(SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL, (SELECT hosp_code FROM hospital WHERE address = #{address}), #{department},#{email},#{datepick},#{hourMinute},SYSDATE,#{symptom},'승인대기중')
